alert.note: Alert for Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yates and north central Steuben Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prattsburg, or 17 miles southwest of Penn Yan, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Potter, Middlesex, Italy, Guyanoga, Vine Valley, Yatesville, Prattsburg, Friend and Italy Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.
